title: World of Shadows
longDescription:
Do you like it? Please leave a review.

World of Shadows is a pack of 11 dark fantasy music loops. You can find here a mysterious atmosphere music for exploration your mystical world as well as heroic and dark battle tracks. In these loops you wil hear such instruments as strings, piano, harp, orchestral brass and battle drums with world percussion. Perfect for fantasy RPG, RTS games with dark, mysterious ambience.

♫ Audio preview - click here ♫
